data.comment: The match is underway at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 1, Los Angeles have a goal kick.
In Orlando Los Angeles attack through Diego Rossi. The finish is off target, however.
Drew Fischer awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portland to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
In the minute 4, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
In the minute 6, Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Jaroslaw Niezgoda gives Portland a 0-1 lead in Orlando.
Sebastian Blanco instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 10, Los Angeles push forward at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex and Diego Rossi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Portland defence.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
In the minute 11, Portland attack but Jaroslaw Niezgoda's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 13, Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Francisco Ginella (Los Angeles) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 15, Drew Fischer signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
Drew Fischer signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Portland have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Portland are whistled for offside.
In the minute 19, Drew Fischer awards Portland a goal kick.
Los Angeles's Brian Rodriguez breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Portland have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Portland to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brian Rodriguez of Los Angeles gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Throw-in Portland.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Los Angeles just outside Portland's area.
In the minute 27, Eduard Atuesta for Los Angeles gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Sebastian Blanco (Portland) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick in a good position for Los Angeles!
In the minute 29, Chris Duvall (Portland) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Los Angeles's Eduard Atuesta gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 30, Drew Fischer awards Portland a goal kick.
Portland needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 34, Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to Portland's area.
Los Angeles pushes forward through Eduard Atuesta, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal! Bradley Wright-Phillips equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 36, That's a fine assist from Latif Blessing.
Los Angeles's Diego Rossi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 37, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Free kick Los Angeles.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Los Angeles at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Goal! A Mark Anthony Kaye header gives Los Angeles a 2-1 lead in Orlando.
In the minute 40, Brian Rodriguez with an assist there.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Portland to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Los Angeles's area.
In the minute 44, Drew Fischer signals a Portland throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Drew Fischer has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Portland have a goal kick.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a first substitution, with Yimmi Chara replacing Marvin Loria.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Portland needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 49, Portland have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Los Angeles.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brian Rodriguez (Los Angeles) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 52, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In Orlando Los Angeles attack through Brian Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 53, Free kick Portland.
Sebastian Blanco (Portland) has received a first yellow card.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 57, Drew Fischer signals a Portland throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's second substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Jeremy Ebobisse replacing Jaroslaw Niezgoda.
In the minute 59, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portland to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
In the minute 60, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Los Angeles's Eduard Atuesta has been booked in Orlando.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
In the minute 64, Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Portland have a goal kick.
Portland advance rapidly upfield but Drew Fischer blows for offside.
In the minute 65, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Cristhian Paredes (Portland) gets a yellow card.
Important block from the Portland defence as Eduard Atuesta fires in a strike for Los Angeles.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Los Angeles make their second substitution with Mohammed El Munir replacing Diego Palacios.
Jose Cifuentes is on a sub for Francisco Ginella for Los Angeles.
In the minute 67, Los Angeles make their third substitution with Andy Najar replacing Bradley Wright-Phillips.
Los Angeles are coming forward and Jose Cifuentes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Diego Valeri is on a sub for Andy Polo for Portland.
Eryk Williamson is on a sub for Cristhian Paredes for Portland.
In the minute 70, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mark Anthony Kaye for Los Angeles who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 75, Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Mark Anthony Kaye has recovered and rejoins the match in Orlando.
Los Angeles are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 76, Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Los Angeles needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
Portland's Jeremy Ebobisse breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 77, Drew Fischer awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to Portland's area.
In the minute 79, Bryce Duke for Los Angeles gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Mark Anthony Kaye (Los Angeles) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Bryce Duke.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In the minute 80, Can Portland capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Portland's Dario Zuparic goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 81, Goal! Portland draw level to 2-2 through a Jeremy Ebobisse header.
Great play from Bill Tuiloma to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
Los Angeles are pushing forward but Jose Cifuentes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Portland make their fifth substitution with Jorge Villafana replacing Marco Farfan.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
At ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Los Angeles drive upfield and Eduard Atuesta gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Portland defender.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Full-time! The final score is 2-2.
